document_data.name: Water Summoning
document_data.mainbody: '''''Water summoning''''' was a spell unique to [[Maztica]].
document_data.Effects: A caster used this spell to summon forth water from the ground, even parched earth. The water appeared as a vertical stream, rising up to 4 feet (1.2 meters) in height. The water continued spouting from the ground until the spell expired. The amount of water summoned was determined by the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
